body_html:
Thank you for your explanation, and sorry for the delayed feedback.

Based on the following:

we're promoting class-based layers and we will not add such function layers
if it doesn't have a state (weights), then it is better for it not to be a layer at all.

We will not add this layer to tf.contrib.

Thanks for the PR regardless.
